attributes.action: have Eddie Izzard Knighted for services to charity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Eddie Izzard, despite having no previous sporting background ran 43 marathons in 51 days to raise money and awareness for Sport Relief. This is a feat of epic proportions in both scale and human will. Any person that does this for charity, famous or not, deserves the highest honour we can bestow.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
